sub_title: Technical marketing | Business development | Product management | Customer Centricity | Sustainability | Innovation |
summary:
Customer centric technical marketing, market & application intelligence manager with drive to expand beyond borders in a curious, creative, interfacing, collaborative and results driven way. 

Dedicated customer focus with a keen eye for new business opportunities by understanding 'the voice of the customer'. Establish relevant product, market and application knowledge for new market & elastomer application opportunities. 
Delivering solutions by introducing the right products and technical expertise. 

More than 30 years technical-commercial experience and knowledge of diverse performance materials (engineering plastics-high performance fibers-additives-high performance elastomers-sustainable products) and diverse end user markets in diverse functions with drive to deliver, right. 

Proficient in interfacing with teams of different departments, at different levels, with different interests and diverse personalities; connecting people; creating sustainable business relationships and multilevel networks contributing to continuity of the business.

Proven competence in project management; building and leading multidisciplinary project teams in line with company and customers project management guidelines and strategy. 

Curious and quick learner; creative analytical, hands-on and problem solving mindset; bridge-builder and cross-pollinator; results driven with an eye for team sensitivities; resilient, perseverant, adaptable and transparent; well developed people skills, well organized.  

Energetic spider in the web 🕸.

projects.title: Product Development and Market Introduction Keltan 2470E for W&C insulation
projects.description:
Keltan® 2470E with low Mooney and high branching level is a very clean EPDM 
rubber, which is designed for peroxide-cured W&C MV-HV insulation. 
Keltan® 2470E based cable compounds are characterized by low compound Mooney 
levels very good processing. This includes good mixing, fast extrusion rates without 
surface melt fracture, excellent control over curing behavior by the type and amount 
of peroxide, good vulcanizate properties, and very low dielectric loss of the final cable 
compound. It shows the highest electrical resistivity level at 90°C and 0.01 Hz, and therefore outperforms low Mooney competitor EPDM grades.

projects.title: Development and Market introduction of Dyneema® Synthetic Link Chain for Steel Link Chain Replacement
projects.description:
The Synthetic Chain is featuring the best combination of properties possible:
- Lighter, longer and stronger lengths can increase productivity by up to a factor of three
- Only 4% elongation at break is ideal for demanding, high precision tie-down tasks
- Link dimensions no more than 1.5 times bigger than steel chain at equal strength 
- Available in SK62, SK75, SK78 and DM20 fiber versions for differing strength and for applications under dynamic as well under permanent load

contributors.headline: Technical marketing | Business development | Product management | Customer Centricity | Sustainability | Innovation |
Global Create Program Lead for:  Cranes with Synthetic Hoist Ropes;  Synthetic Link Chains at AVIENT PROTECTIVE MATERIALS B.V. , Geleen (The Netherlands)

projects.title: Development and Market introduction Flexible high tenacity laminate Valmex® CF10
projects.description:
The flexible high tenacity laminate in fabric door design is to deliver lightweight, durable doors for safe containment through a strategic balance of key factors - lightweight, user-friendly, compliance and high environmental and operational resistance. 

Impressive tensile strength, remarkable impact resistance, and excellent tear and wear properties makes the Nordisk D4000 door tougher and more resistant to puncture and cutting. The best choice for ULD operations struggling with excessive door maintenance costs.

projects.title: Development and Market introduction Rigid panel Aeronite® RP10
projects.description:
The lightweight rigid panel used in air cargo containers of DoKaSch, achieves:
   Lowest possible weight 
   Less fuel consumption  
   Lower CO2 emissions  
   Increased strength  
   Rigid boards  
   Greater than 50 % reduction in maintenance

projects.title: Development and Market introduction Dyneema® monoline for fishing lines
projects.description:
The monoline is featuring the best combination of properties possible:
- high strength-to-weigth
- superior abrasion resistance
- zero moisture absorption
- flexibility and supple feel
- extremely low elongation
- high resistance to Uv degradation
- no memory
- extremely low friction
So not only of interest to fishing lines, but also to filtration, printing a.o.

projects.title: Development and Market introduction Melapur® MP and Melapur® 200 flame retardant
projects.description:
All Melapur flame retardants are free of halogens, antimony or any other heavy metals. 
Regulatory compatibility: Halogen, antimony and metal free flame retardants. Allows finished products to conform to eco-labels
Protection throughout product lifecycle:Lower smoke density, less corrosive to processing equipment, reduces ancillary damage to equipment and material in case of fire
Materials: Allows for broader coloration options.
Can be incorporated into a variety of
applications. Can be used alone or synergistically with other materials.

contributors.headline: Technical marketing | Business development | Product management | Customer Centricity | Sustainability | Innovation |

profile_positions.description:
Responsible to identify business opportunities for ARLANXEO elastomer product portfolio in existing and new rubber applications and markets, develop concepts to sell into those markets against maximum value
o	Be aware of new developments/markets, trends and judge value for the elastomer business      
o	Stay abreast of new technical and market development opportunities in elastomer applications
o	Develop elastomer market/application assessments and technical business plans for penetration in identified product/market combinations (Flooring, Epoxy and rPET impact modification)
o      Global technical focal point and authority for New Mobility, Roofing & Flooring, Keltan® Eco and Keltan® Eco based TPV, TPV in general, sustainable innovation and related application development within the company and at (key)customers
o	Give structure to existing developments and projects and make sure they are bringing value
o	Build and maintain a network of internal and external contacts/sources in "the rubber world" 
o	Guide sales and research & development resources by market/applications studies and customer visits	
o      Visit OEM's, conferences and exhibitions on regular basis to hear about developments, present new products and advise management on market trends
o        Maintain, renew and grow the ARLANXEO product portfolio by giving topnotch technical support to customers, distributors and agents in Russia/CIS, Turkey, Hungary and Eastern Europe
o        Support ARLANXEO with Change Management projects for Organizational Health in light of the new ARLANXEO organization
profile_positions.title: Technical Marketing | Market Intelligence ARLANXEO Elastomer Products

profile_positions.description:
Main task is to maintain, renew and grow the Keltan®/Keltan®Eco (EPDM), and Krynac®/Perbunan®/Baymod® (NBR) business by giving topnotch technical support to customers in Russia/CIS, Turkey & Hungary
o Generate new development projects at customers in order to strengthen ARLANXEOs position in market leadership for EPDM/NBR
o Scout new business opportunities in existing and new EPDM/NBR applications
o Assess rubber market/application combinations and develop technical business plans for penetration in the identified product/market combinations (impact New Mobility on elastomer applications, Sponge grade survey and grade development, sustainable Innovation for Keltan® Eco and Keltan® Eco TPV )
o Global technical focal point and authority for New Mobility, Roofing, Keltan® Eco and Keltan® Eco based TPV, TPV in general and related application developments within the company and at customers.
o High-level competence & knowledge management on diverse rubber based applications in Roofing, New Mobility, Automotive, Building & Construction, Tire & Tube, Wire & Cable and bio based EPDM/TPV markets
o Brand Ambassador for ARLANXEO
profile_positions.title: Technical Marketing | Market Intelligence EPDM&NBR

profile_positions.description:
Main task is to maintain, renew and grow the Keltan® (EPDM) business by giving topnotch technical support to Keltan® customers in Russia/CIS & Hungary
o Generate new development projects at customers in order to strengthen LANXESS  / ARLANXEOs position in market leadership
o Scout new business opportunities in existing and new EPDM applications
o Introduce, set up and maintain ideation process and project stage gate process
o Assess rubber market/application combinations and develop technical business plans for penetration in the identified product/market combinations (Roofing membrane market study, Keltan ® Eco business development, T&T product replacement and W&C grade development).
o Global technical focal point and authority for Ideation, Roofing and Keltan® Eco related application development within the company and at customers
o High-level competence & knowledge management on rubber based application in Automotive, Building & Construction, Roofing, Tire & Tube, Wire & Cable markets
profile_positions.title: Technical Marketing | Market Intelligence EPDM

profile_positions.description:
Mapping, actively spotting, screening, evaluating and acquiring new business opportunities for IPHC panels and structures in automotive, marine, aerospace,building & construction and windenergy a.o.

Extremely strong, stiff and insulating IPHC panels and structures give substantial weight reduction allowing reduction in energy consumption, increase in payload, low maintanance and repair costs compared to infusion foamed and corrugated core panels and structures.
